remarks:
A mixed syllogism inference, useful for applying a definition to both sides of an implication.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Jan-1993.)

 A mixed syllogism inference, useful for applying a definition to both sides of an implication.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)
statement:
3imtr4.1 $e |- ( ph -> ps ) $.
3imtr4.2 $e |- ( ch <-> ph ) $.
3imtr4.3 $e |- ( th <-> ps ) $.
3imtr4i $p |- ( ch -> th ) $.
